sys_embedded_help_content.content:
Using the needit Form


Use the needit application to
request services and good from
several departments.

. Legal
. Human Resources
. Facilities

Needit Form Fields

 

1. For new Needlt records, the
Requested for field is pre-
populated with your name. If
you are opening a Needlt
request for someone else, you
can change the value in the
Requested for field.

2. The Requested for email field
is automatically populated if
you change the user in the
Requested for field. You can
change the Requested for
email field value.

3. The choices in the What
needed field depend on the
value in the Request type field.

4. If the value in the What
needed field is Other, the
Other field appears. Use the
Other field to add a few words
about your request.

5. Use the calendar picker in the
When needed field to set the
due date for the Needlt
request.

6. Use the Short description and
Description fields to provide
more information about your
request.

Note: When creating Needit requests, the When needed date cannot be today or in the past.

 

Need More Help?

You can learn about form fields on
the ServiceNow docs site.
sys_embedded_help_content.name: Ursonal NeedIt Form
